KAAZING WebSocket Intercloud Connect

Cloud Provider Partners

LDAP
Active Directory
Oracle SQL*Net
SQL Server
DB2
Postgres
POP3
SMTP
SNMP
XMPP
MQTT
AMQP

Cloud Provider Partners

KAAZING WebSocket Intercloud Connect is cloud provider agnostic and is being rolled out to all the major cloud providers. It is currently available on Microsoft Azure Marketplace; others are to follow in short order.
